metadata.title: Software for using the temperature sensor in an RX-family product

sections.content:
Question:
What software should I use for using the temperature sensor in an RX-family product?
Answer:
Use the FIT module (r01an1666) as an ADC module or the ADC function of CG.
Suitable Products
RX
